Provides an EventBridge event API Destination resource.

> **Note:** EventBridge was formerly known as CloudWatch Events. The functionality is identical.

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := cloudwatch.NewEventApiDestination(ctx, "test", &cloudwatch.EventApiDestinationArgs{
			Description:                  pulumi.String("An API Destination"),
			InvocationEndpoint:           pulumi.String("https://api.destination.com/endpoint"),
			HttpMethod:                   pulumi.String("POST"),
			InvocationRateLimitPerSecond: pulumi.Int(20),
			ConnectionArn:                pulumi.Any(aws_cloudwatch_event_connection.Test.Arn),
		})

		return nil
	})
}

            title="Required">
        <span id="invocationendpoint_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#invocationendpoint_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Invocation<wbr>Endpoint</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>

            title="Optional">
        <span id="description_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The description of the new API Destination. Maximum of 512 characters.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="invocationratelimitpersecond_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#invocationratelimitpersecond_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Invocation<wbr>Rate<wbr>Limit<wbr>Per<wbr>Second</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Enter the maximum number of invocations per second to allow for this destination. Enter a value greater than 0 (default 300).</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="name_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#name_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The name of the new API Destination. The name must be unique for your account. Maximum of 64 characters consisting of numbers, lower/upper case letters, .,-,_.</p>
</dd></dl>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the event API Destination.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_connectionarn_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>ARN of the EventBridge Connection to use for the API Destination.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_description_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_description_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Description</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The description of the new API Destination. Maximum of 512 characters.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_httpmethod_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_httpmethod_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Http<wbr>Method</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Select the HTTP method used for the invocation endpoint, such as GET, POST, PUT, etc.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_invocationendpoint_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_invocationendpoint_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Invocation<wbr>Endpoint</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>URL endpoint to invoke as a target. This could be a valid endpoint generated by a partner service. You can include &quot;*&quot; as path parameters wildcards to be set from the Target HttpParameters.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_invocationratelimitpersecond_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_invocationratelimitpersecond_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Invocation<wbr>Rate<wbr>Limit<wbr>Per<wbr>Second</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Enter the maximum number of invocations per second to allow for this destination. Enter a value greater than 0 (default 300).</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_name_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_name_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The name of the new API Destination. The name must be unique for your account. Maximum of 64 characters consisting of numbers, lower/upper case letters, .,-,_.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_name_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The name of the new API Destination. The name must be unique for your account. Maximum of 64 characters consisting of numbers, lower/upper case letters, .,-,_.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>






## Import



Using `pulumi import`, import EventBridge API Destinations using the `name`. For example:

```sh
 $ pulumi import aws:cloudwatch/eventApiDestination:EventApiDestination test api-destination
```
